life_regen_time.description: How much is the Reinforce going to go on cooldown when it begins regenerating a life?

immediate_extraction.description: [bool]If set, will immediately call in the shuttle instead of the landing beacon when extraction is available.

regular_extraction_on_mission_end.description: [bool](Only used if Immediate Extraction is set) If set, will use a regular extraction when the mission timer ends, instead of an immediate extraction.

regular_extraction_on_mission_fail.description: [bool](Only used if Immediate Extraction is set) If set, will use a regular extraction when the mission fails, instead of an immediate extraction.

trigger_extraction_when_timer_runs_out.description: [bool]If set, will trigger extraction when the mission timer runs out.

map_size_override.description: If non-zero, will override the map size for this specific mission. Range 0-1.
